Name: Nightblade

Traits.Name: Huge
Traits.Effect: Siege: Deal double damage to structures. You occupy a 10ft x 10ft space.

Traits.Name: The Vine
Traits.Effect: Includes: Flexible Body, Thorns, Grasping Tendrils, No Bones.

Traits.Name: Tremor
Traits.Effect: Passive: Ground-Sense (Detect footsteps within 30ft. Cannot be Surprised).

Traits.Name: Spores
Traits.Effect: Active: Dust (Cone Spray. Poison, Sleep, or Hallucinate).

Traits.Name: Root-Walk
Traits.Effect: Passive: Anchor (Cannot be Knocked Prone. Speed -5ft).

Traits.Name: Waxy
Traits.Effect: Passive: Sealed (Immune to dehydration. Resistance to Acid).

Traits.Name: Regrow
Traits.Effect: Active: Photosynthesis (Heal 25% HP in sunlight over 1 min).

Backstory:
The Sense. Sensing the emotional intent behind the words and defusing it before it lands. "I know you're angry, but this isn't about me."

Survival handling animals. Lore: Biology ecology and healing.

Mastery of banners warhorns and badges to signal and rally troops.

Reach. Spatial awareness. Keeping the enemy at exact range.

Mana-Weave. Warding patterns that require academic understanding.

Debilitate. Tricky, annoying, and stylish tools.
